title: Senior Advisor David Axelrod and White House Counsel Bob Bauer to Discuss Elena Kagan's Testimony Before the Senate Judiciary Committee | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 25, 2010

 



Senior Advisor David Axelrod and White House Counsel Bob Bauer to Discuss Elena Kagan's Testimony Before the Senate Judiciary Committee




WASHINGTON – Today at 11:45am EDT, Senior Advisor David Axelrod and White House Counsel Bob Bauer will hold a conference call in advance of next week’s Senate Judiciary Committee confirmation hearings on Elena Kagan’s Supreme Court nomination.
WHO: David Axelrod, Senior Advisor to the President
            Bob Bauer, White House Counsel
WHAT: Conference Call with David Axelrod and Bob Bauer to Discuss Kagan’s Judiciary Committee Testimony
WHEN: Friday, June 25
               11:45am EDT
HOW: Reporters wishing to join this call should dial (800) 398-9389
